name: Swim Away
description:
*CONTROL*

Use the left and right arrow keys to control the fish.

*INTRO*

We all know that overfishing is a serious problem, while I think that letting players stand in the victim’s shoes can make the narrative and notion more straightforward. So in the game, players not only have to avoid the net, but also be careful of the environment in the ocean, trying to raise more awareness to the problem.

*CREDITS*

This game is inspired by 小朋友下樓梯

Unity Assests: Free Pixel Space Platform Pack & Bolt 2D JellyFarm Assets Pack
